description: Brenner Bolton and Bennett Anthony are paired to do a scene together but when Brenner arrives he is told that production is running behind schedule. Not pleased with having to wait, Brenner is waiting by the pool table when Bennett Anthony walks in. Bennett has been a fan of Brenner for a while now and just can’t wait to get into that perfect ass. The two start going at it until our sexy producer walks in and immediately starts to record their pool table fuck session.
title: Downtime Get Down
